trl.name: Analytical and Experimental Proof‑of‑Concept
trl.description: Laboratory proof‑of‑concept via analyses and early prototypes.
trl.deliverables: ['Lab‑scale prototypes or test articles', 'Test plans/fixtures', 'Performance reports comparing measured vs. predicted metrics']
trl.label: Analytical and Experimental Proof‑of‑Concept

hosting_env.label: Local GUI Application
hosting_env.description: Tool runs as a native graphical application on a local workstation (e.g., Windows .exe or macOS .app).

interfaces.label: Graphical User Interface (GUI)
interfaces.description: Visual interface with forms, buttons, and input fields, accessible via desktop or web.

access_methods.label: Access: Website
access_methods.description: Tool or service is accessed via a public or internal website URL.

input_types.label: JSON File
input_types.description: Generic structured input for configurations, logs, or indicators

output_types.label: STIX 2.1 Bundle
output_types.description: Structured CTI output used for intelligence sharing and correlation

output_types.label: JSON File
output_types.description: Structured machine-readable output (e.g., alerts, configs, observables)

output_types.label: CSV Export
output_types.description: Tabular data for analysis in tools like Excel, pandas, or SOC dashboards

import_formats.label: STIX 2.1 Bundle
import_formats.description: Structured CTI ingestion format used in threat intelligence systems (e.g., OpenCTI, MISP)

import_formats.label: JSON File
import_formats.description: Generic structured data input format used for configurations, enrichment, or model-based inputs

import_formats.label: CSV File
import_formats.description: Spreadsheet-compatible format used for importing indicators, logs, or IOC lists

import_formats.label: TXT Log
import_formats.note: The import isn't just a .txt file log it is just a regular text file with contents.

export_formats.label: STIX 2.1
export_formats.description: Structured Threat Intelligence format (OASIS) for sharing CTI with tools like OpenCTI, MISP

export_formats.label: JSON
export_formats.description: General-purpose structured format for config, logs, telemetry, or API response data

export_formats.label: CSV
export_formats.description: Tabular data format for structured logs, observables, indicators, or reports

export_formats.label: PDF
export_formats.description: Human-readable output for briefings, summaries, or deliverables

export_formats.label: TXT
export_formats.description: Raw log export or plain text data for analyst review
